text: Balki Mo onho va padaronasonro ʙahramand kardem, to muddati umrason daroz sud. Vale kofiron ʙo molu farzand va hajoti darozason maƣrur suda ʙar kufrason ʙoqi mondand va gujo, ki azoʙ doda namesavand. Ojo in musrikon, ki sitoʙi azoʙi Alloh mekunand nameʙinand, ki Mo pajvasta ʙa suroƣi sarzamini kufr meoem, ki onro az atrof va domanahojas mekohem? Ojo onho piruzand jo Mo
